The 5 steps to create a site with Wordpress

We show you how to go from x to y.

  1. .com
    step 1 Getting a domain name
  2. step 2 Getting a web hosting plan
  3. step 3 Installing Wordpress
  4. step 4 Installing Elementor
  5. step 5 Customize website

step 1


Getting a domain name


Q: Some webhosting providers offer free domain names, why not get one from them?

A: Maintainance fees for domains are way more expensive when a web hosting provider is managing it.

Maintaining a domain on a web hosting provider is about $30.00/yr  while doing it from Namecheap or Google Domains is around $10.00/yr

The solution: Get the domain name from a dedicated domain provider and connect the domain to your web host.

Next step

Domain providers

These are the two recommended Domain Name providers, they both keep mantainance fees at an affordable proce level and offer high quality services.


Namecheap

Get domain with Namecheap

Google Domain

Get your domain with Google Domains
